next_question.text: What would you like to eat?

Hamburger.end_message: Nice, I will order a hamburger for you!

text: Do you want to go shopping?

next_question.text: Which kind of clothes do you need?

Coat.end_message: Nice, I will order a coat for you!

No.end_message: No? Well... then I will order a black dress.

Jean.end_message: Nice, I will order a jean for you!
